name: Labor
description:
Labor - nostalgic first-person shooter.
Player has to go through crowds of zombies and cyborgs, collect data about participants of the experiment and destroy the laboratory.

Unnamed employee of unnamed post as usual came on his working Monday to his tight, office chair. But as soon as the front door jammed, he immediately realized that today's day will be much interesting than the previous ones.

Tips for passing:
  • No need to hurry.
  • Save after each passed level.
  • Don't waste ammo on weak enemies.

Features
  • Familiar arsenal.
  • Gameplay according to the classic canons.
  • Red crowbar.
  • Epic music.
  • Blood, blood, mucus.
  • Oldschool setting.
